title: 104_s469
content: Title II of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act is amended by eliminating the National Education Standards and Improvement Council and Opportunity-to-Learn Standards. Technical and conforming amendments are also made. The Goals 2000: Educate America Act is amended by restructuring the table of contents for Title II, renaming parts B and C, and making adjustments to Section 2 of the Act. The Goals 2000: Educate America Act is amended by restructuring the table of contents for Title II, renaming parts B and C, and making adjustments to various sections of the Act, including redesignating subparagraphs and amending specific sections related to student performance standards. Section 203 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act is amended to review voluntary national content standards and student performance standards. Section 203 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act is amended to review voluntary national content standards and student performance standards. Subsequent sections are amended to remove specific language and subsections. Section 203 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act is amended to review voluntary national content standards and student performance standards. Following amendments remove specific language and subsections in various sections of the Act. Section 203 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act is amended to review voluntary national content standards and student performance standards. Subsequent amendments remove specific language and subsections in various sections of the Act, including changes to Section 312(b), Section 314(a)(6)(A), and Section 315. In Section 203 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act, amendments are made to voluntary national content standards and student performance standards. Changes include removing specific language and subsections in various sections of the Act, such as Section 312(b), Section 314(a)(6)(A), and Section 315. Amendments also involve renumbering and redesignating certain subparagraphs in paragraph (2). Amendments to the Goals 2000: Educate America Act involve changes to voluntary national content standards and student performance standards, including renumbering and redesignating certain subparagraphs in the Act. Amendments to the Goals 2000: Educate America Act include repealing section 316 and amending section 317 by removing references to specific subsections and standards. Amendments to section 503 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act involve changes in subsection (b) by adjusting paragraph (1) and redesignating certain paragraphs. Amendments to section 503 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act involve redesignating subparagraphs and paragraphs within the section. Amendments to section 504 of the Goals 2000: Educate America Act involve striking subsection (f) and redesignating subsection (g) as subsection (f). In the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, changes include updating subsections and paragraphs within the section. Amendments to the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 involve removing opportunity-to-learn standards or strategies from certain subsections and redesignating subsections within the Act. Amendments involve removing and redesignating subsections in the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965. Amendments to the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 involve removing and redesignating subsections in various sections of the Act. Amendments to education laws involve removing specific references and updating sections to reflect changes made in previous acts.
